content: **christmas baubles pattern** a fun little project for the holiday season this is a written pattern using american crochet terminology with photos for both the crochet and assembly parts the pattern is in english available in pdf right-handed and left-handed versions and printable pdf without pictures format **skill level ** intermediate **time to complete ** 3-5 hours **yarn ** sport weight yarn 50g = 150-200 m **hook ** 2 mm - 2 25 mm b crochet hook **bauble base ** 6 cm bauble or styrofoam ball if you don t have either use stuffing **thank you to my amazing testers ** ani @aniramsfairytale tiffany @thehawkingbasket anaiira @anaiira knits nikelle @handmadebynikelle joke j0k3 *this pattern is the property of @sophieandyarn do not claim this pattern as your own credit @sophieandyarn when sharing this pattern or the finished product online you may sell items handmade by you using this pattern you may not mass produce items using this pattern *
